Skill.label: ^5(Switch to Soulwrest as soon as you get it)^5

PathOfBuilding.Notes:
^6^7==================== = = = ^6VIDEO GUIDE^7 = = = ====================
The detailed video guide can be found here: https://youtu.be/0-rvyGpAP2w
----------------------------------------
==================== = = = ^6HOW TO USE^7 = = = ====================
- Navigate to "Tree" tab then choose a passive tree in the bottom-left dropdown menu (next to "About"), according to your progress. - Adjust your current character level at the top - Put on and edit example gear or import your own stuff with the Import/Export Build feature. - Adjust gem levels and quality, and enable optional gems if used. - Configure anything relevant in the Configuration tab.
^4IMPORTANT: the Custom Modifiers section in the Configuration tab contains Animate Guardian gear bonuses (POB can't calculate them automatically). Remove/comment the ones you don't have on your AG and adjust accordingly^7
Other important notes:
- All example rare gear pieces use the most recommended affixes for that slot with average rolls. - Activate Flasks to see their impact on DPS or defense. - Gems that don't need quality or need to stay at a certain level are shown like that, all others are defaulted at 20/20.
==================== = = = ^6GEAR^7 = = = ====================
**POE Trade search links:
^7^7^8^9^1^2======= WEAPON =======^7
^xB97123^xAF6025Soulwrest^7^7 staff: https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Archnemesis/Pop83QDTL
^4IMPORTANT: you do NOT need to link the staff; you just need 6 sockets^7
^7^5^6^2======= BODY ARMOUR =======^3^3^8^7
Basic tier / mid-tier https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Archnemesis/qJD8Vq3ug Best-in-slot - https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Archnemesis/vjJe02JuE
^4IMPORTANT: you only need 5-links on the body armour so there's no point in searching for already linked ones. It's very cheap and easy to get 6-sockets and 5-links yourself, which means you can buy cheap non-linked armours with great mods.
^xD02090>> Eldritch Crafting implicits:^7
> ^xE05030Searing Exarch^7: "% increased effect of your offerings" (Defense) OR "% increased effect of Non-Curse Auras from your Skills" (DPS) > ^6Eater of the Worlds: ^7"Hatred has % increased Aura Effect"
^4 ^2======= HELMET =======^2^2^6^6^1^8^0^8^7^6^7
Basic tier / mid-tier: https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Archnemesis/GjqkGpDhb Best-in-slot (^xB97123^xAF6025Devouring Diadem^7^7): https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Archnemesis/d4KGngpcJ
^6^7^4>> HELMET ENCHANT^4^7
Sniper's Mark has 30% increased Curse Effect OR Defiance Banner has 40% increased Aura Effect
^2======= GLOVES =======^2^7
^xB97123^xAF6025Triad Grip^7^7: https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Heist/Bgl3dp3C8
^2======= BOOTS =======^2^7
Basic tier: https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Archnemesis/nwlKwvMc0 Mid-tier: https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Archnemesis/BQX9BYLu8 Best-in-slot: https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Archnemesis/BQX9lb3i8
^xD02090>> Eldritch Crafting implicits:^7^7
> ^xE05030Searing Exarch^7: "Drops Brittle Ground while moving, lasting X seconds" > ^6Eater of the Worlds: ^7"% chance to Avoid being Poisoned" OR "% increased Cooldown Recovery Rate of Travel Skills"
^2======= BELT =======^7
Basic tier: https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Archnemesis/JyXZXGRSl Mid tier: https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Archnemesis/qJD28yvSg Best-in-slot (^xAF6025Darkness Enthroned^7): https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Archnemesis/eoqaW8bIL
^3^2======= AMULET =======^7
Basic/mid-tier: https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Archnemesis/7KVrZ5yS5 Best-in-slot (^xAF6025Aul's Uprising - Hatred has no Reservation^7): https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Archnemesis/Dd45oBC5
^2======= RINGS =======^7
Basic tier: https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Archnemesis/6pmLkMXcG Mid-tier: https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Heist/Q2wWnopCw Best-in-slot: https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Archnemesis/RyX6adZH7
^3^2======= JEWELS =======^7
^4IMPORTANT: you can roll various implicits on non-corrupted jewels using Harvest; the best one would be^x8888FF "^x8888FF15% chance to Avoid being Stunned^7^x8888FF"^7. ^4With so many jewels + socketing 2 of them in Darkness Enthroned you can easily become STUN IMMUNE! Even getting 60-70% is still a huge deal and you will never really get stunned^7
Fortress Covenant: https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Archnemesis/YpBybjgUY Quickening Covenant: https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Archnemesis/glrYlbjUQ Ghastly Eye basic tier: https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Archnemesis/eJvpjGgiL Ghastly Eye mid-tier / best-in-slot: https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Archnemesis/pEkP3lbS0
^4OPTIONAL (very high budget) - you can also use a ^xE05030Forbidden Flame^7 + ^6Forbidden Flesh^4 pair of jewels. Keep in mind you can get Commander of Darkness, Bone Barrier or Mistress of Sacrifice on these jewels, in which case you should respec those ascendancy passive points and get Plaguebringer as your 5th ascendancy passive^7
Forbidden Flame - https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Archnemesis/29kmMyock Forbidden Flesh - https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Archnemesis/gJpZPPOUQ
^2======= CLUSTER JEWELS =======^7^6^7
Large cluster: https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Archnemesis/dZaLRgqFJ Medium cluster: https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Heist/4497eKEH9
^7^6^2======= ANIMATE GUARDIAN GEAR =======^7
Basic Tier:
Helmet: https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Archnemesis/QPeMHw Weapon: https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Archnemesis/YpaZrIY Boots: https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Archnemesis/XLYeIP Gloves: https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Archnemesis/zb3QMaF4 Body armour: https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Archnemesis/ZZXYMWRuQ
===========
Best-in-slot:
Helmet: https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Archnemesis/yM30pBSR Weapon: https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Archnemesis/8nk5qIV (^2or buy NON-corrutped Soul Taker + Heartbreaker and vendor them together with an Orb of Fusing to obtain the Kingmaker Axe^2^7) Boots: https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Archnemesis/b2p9vK2uL Gloves: https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Archnemesis/z5BKlmT4 (^2or buy NON-corrutped Vixen's Entrapment gloves and vaal them yourself; the chance to hit the Ele Weakness curse is pretty high^7) Body armour: https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Archnemesis/qPW3yGWug
^3^2======= FLASKS =======^7
> Seething/Terrified + Divine Life Flask + of Allaying / Assuaging (^x7070FFinstant healing + bleed immunity^7) > Rumi's Concoction > Experimenter's + Quicksilver Flask + of Adrenaline (^x8888FFincreased duration + extra movement speed^7) > Experimenter's + Jade flask + of the Gazelle (^x8888FFincreased duration + extra evasion^7) > Ample + Basalt flask + of the Pangolin (^x8888FFextra charges + extra armour^7)
